details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: PDF/A-1B validation profile
details.description: Validation rules against ISO 19005-1:2005, Cor.1:2007 and Cor.2:2011

rule.description: An XObject dictionary shall not contain the SMask key

error.message: An XObject contains an SMask key

rule.description: For any given composite (Type 0) font referenced within a conforming file, the CIDSystemInfo entries of its CIDFont and CMap dictionaries shall be compatible

error.message: Registry and Ordering entries in the CIDFont and CMap dictionaries of a Type 0 font are not compatible

rule.description: A conforming file shall not contain any reference XObjects

error.message: The document contains a reference XObject (Ref key in the form XObject dictionary)

rule.description: If a document information dictionary does appear at a document, then all of its entries that have analogous properties in predefined XMP schemas, shall also be embedded in the file in XMP form with equivalent values.

error.message: Some of document information dictionary entries' that have analogous properties in predefined XMP schemas do not embedded or have not equivalent values in the file in XMP form.

rule.description: For all CIDFont subsets referenced within a conforming file, the font descriptor dictionary shall include a CIDSet stream identifying which CIDs are present in the embedded CIDFont file, as described in PDF Reference Table 5.20

error.message: A CID Font subset does not define CIDSet entry in its Descriptor dictionary

rule.description: The PDF/A version and conformance level of a file shall be specified using the PDF/A Identification extension schema.

error.message: The "part" property of the PDF/A Identification Schema is %1 instead of 1 for PDF/A-1b conforming file.

rule.description: Metadata object stream dictionaries shall not contain the Filter key.

error.message: The metadata object stream dictionary contains the Filter key.

rule.description: An ExtGState dictionary shall not contain the TR key

error.message: An ExtGState dictionary contains the TR key

rule.description: The document catalog dictionary of a conforming file shall contain the Metadata key.

error.message: The document catalog dictionary doesn't contain metadata key.

rule.description: Maximum capacity of a dictionary (in entries) is 4095

error.message: Maximum capacity of a dictionary (4095) exceeded

rule.description: A conforming file shall not contain any PostScript XObjects

error.message: The document contains a PostScript XObject

rule.description: Maximum number of DeviceN components is 8

error.message: Maximum number of DeviceN components is exceeded

rule.description: For all Type 1 font subsets referenced within a conforming file, the font descriptor dictionary shall include a CharSet string listing the character names defined in the font subset, as described in PDF Reference Table 5.18

error.message: A Type1 font subset does not define CharSet entry in its Descriptor dictionary

rule.description: A PDF/A Field Schema namespace prefix is required to be "pdfaField".

error.message: A PDF/A Field Schema namespace prefix is not "pdfaField".

rule.description: No data shall follow the last end-of-file marker except a single optional end-of-line marker.

error.message: Data is present after the last end-of-file marker

rule.description: Maximum capacity of an array (in elements) is 8191

error.message: Maximum capacity of an array (8191) exceeded

rule.description: The bytes attribute shall not be used in the header of an XMP packet.

error.message: The XMP Package contains bytes attribute.

rule.description: The file trailer dictionary shall contain the ID keyword. The file trailer referred to is either the last trailer dictionary in a PDF file, as described in PDF Reference 3.4.4 and 3.4.5, or the first page trailer in a linearized PDF file, as described in PDF Reference F.2
rule.test: (isLinearized == true && firstPageID != null) || ((isLinearized != true) && lastID != null)

error.message: Missing ID in the document trailer

rule.description: If an uncalibrated colour space is used in a file then that file shall contain a PDF/A-1 OutputIntent, as defined in 6.2.2

error.message: DeviceGray colour space is used without output intent profile

rule.description: Maximum length of a string (in bytes) is 65535

error.message: Maximum length of a String (65535) exceeded

rule.description: An annotation dictionary shall not contain the CA key with a value other than 1.0

error.message: An annotation dictionary contains the CA key with value other than 1.0

rule.description: A file's name dictionary, as defined in PDF Reference 3.6.3, shall not contain the EmbeddedFiles key

error.message: The document contains embedded files (EmbeddedFiles key is present in the file's name dictionary)

rule.description: The encoding attribute shall not be used in the header of an XMP packet.

error.message: The XMP Package contains encoding attribute.

rule.description: All symbolic TrueType fonts shall not specify an Encoding entry in the font dictionary

error.message: A symbolic TrueType font specifies an Encoding entry in its dictionary

rule.description: The stream keyword shall be followed either by a CARRIAGE RETURN (0Dh) and LINE FEED (0Ah) character sequence or by a single LINE FEED character. The endstream keyword shall be preceded by an EOL marker

error.message: Spacings of keywords 'stream' and 'endstream' do not comply PDF/A specification

rule.description: Maximum length of a name (in bytes) is 127

error.message: Maximum length of a Name (127) exceeded

rule.description: A PDF/A ValueType Schema namespace prefix is required to be "pdfaType".

error.message: A PDF/A ValueType Schema namespace prefix is not "pdfaType".

rule.description: For those CMaps that are embedded, the integer value of the WMode entry in the CMap dictionary shall be identical to the WMode value in the embedded CMap stream

error.message: WMode entry in the embedded CMap and in the CMap dictionary are not identical

rule.description: A Widget annotation dictionary shall not include an AA entry for an additional-actions dictionary

error.message: A Widget annotation contains an additional-actions dictionary (AA entry)

rule.description: If an Image dictionary contains the Interpolate key, its value shall be false

error.message: The value of the Interpolate key in the Image dictionary is true

rule.description: The % character of the file header shall occur at byte offset 0 of the file. The first line of a PDF file is a header identifying the version of the PDF specification to which the file conforms

error.message: File header does not start at byte offset 0 or does not correctly identify the version of the PDF document

rule.description: The LZWDecode filter shall not be permitted

error.message: LZW compression is used

rule.description: Interactive form fields shall not perform actions of any type

error.message: Interactive form field contains an action object ('A' key)

rule.description: The document catalog dictionary shall not contain a key with the name OCProperties

error.message: The document catalog dictionary contains the OCProperties entry

rule.description: All extension schemas used in a conforming file shall have their descriptions embedded within that file in the metadata stream.

error.message: Wrong definition of an extention schema with namespace URI: %1

rule.description: The keyword Encrypt shall not be used in the trailer dictionary

error.message: Encrypt keyword is present in the trailer dictionary

rule.description: For all annotation dictionaries containing an AP key, the appearance dictionary that it defines as its value shall contain only the N key. If an annotation dictionary’s Subtype key has a value of Widget and its FT key has a value of Btn, the value of the N key shall be an appearance subdictionary; otherwise the value of the N key shall be an appearance stream.

error.message: Annotation's appearance dictionary contains entries other than N or the N entry has an invalid type

rule.description: The PDF/A version and conformance level of a file shall be specified using the PDF/A Identification extension schema.

error.message: The "conformance" property of the PDF/A Identification Schema is %1 instead of "B" for PDF/A-1b conforming file.

rule.description: The PDF/A Identification Schema has required prefix "pdfaid".

error.message: A PDF/A Identification Schema namespace prefix is %1, but shall be "pdfaid".

rule.description: The NeedAppearances flag of the interactive form dictionary shall either not be present or shall be false

error.message: The interactive form dictionary contains the NeedAppearances flag with value true

rule.description: The following keys, if present in an ExtGState object, shall have the values shown: BM - Normal or Compatible

error.message: An ExtGState dictionary contains the BM key (blend mode) with a value other than Normal or Compatible

rule.description: All predefined schemas shall conform to XMP specification.

error.message: The predefined schema with namespace URI %1 has properties of wrong type: %2.

rule.description: Named actions other than NextPage, PrevPage, FirstPage, and LastPage shall not be permitted

error.message: Unknown or not permitted action type

rule.description: All non-white-space characters in hexadecimal strings shall be in the range 0 to 9, A to F or a to f

error.message: Hexadecimal string contains non-white-space characters outside the range 0 to 9, A to F or a to f

rule.description: The required PDF/A Extension Schema namespace prefix is pdfaExtension.

error.message: A PDF/A Extension Schema namespace prefix is %1, but shall be "pdfaExtension".

rule.description: Hexadecimal strings shall contain an even number of non-white-space characters

error.message: Hexadecimal string contains odd number of non-white-space characters

rule.description: A content stream shall not contain any operators not defined in PDF Reference even if such operators are bracketed by the BX/EX compatibility operators

error.message: A content stream contains an operator not defined in PDF Reference

rule.description: The PDF/A version and conformance level of a file shall be specified using the PDF/A Identification extension schema.

error.message: The document metadata stream doesn't contains PDF/A Identification Schema.

rule.description: In a cross reference subsection header the starting object number and the range shall be separated by a single SPACE character (20h)

error.message: Spacings of subsection headers in the cross reference table do not comply PDF/A specification

rule.description: A form XObject dictionary shall not contain the Subtype2 key with a value of PS or the PS key

error.message: The form XObject dictionary contains a PS key or Subtype2 key with value PS

rule.description: The value of the Length key specified in the stream dictionary shall match the number of bytes in the file following the LINE FEED character after the stream keyword and preceding the EOL marker before the endstream keyword

error.message: Actual length of the stream does not match the value of the Length key in the Stream dictionary

rule.description: A file specification dictionary, as defined in PDF 3.10.2, shall not contain the EF key

error.message: A file specification dictionary contains the EF key

rule.description: A Field dictionary shall not include an AA entry for an additional-actions dictionary

error.message: A Field dictionary contains an additional-actions dictionary (AA entry)

rule.description: A PDF/A Property Schema namespace prefix is required to be "pdfaProperty".

error.message: A PDF/A Property Schema namespace prefix is not "pdfaProperty".

rule.description: A Group object with an S key with a value of Transparency shall not be included in a form XObject. A Group object with an S key with a value of Transparency shall not be included in a page dictionary

error.message: A transparency group is present in a form XObject or page dictionary

rule.description: A Widget annotation dictionary or Field dictionary shall not contain the A or AA keys

error.message: A Widget annotation contains either A or AA entry

rule.description: Where a rendering intent is specified, its value shall be one of the four values defined in PDF Reference RelativeColorimetric, AbsoluteColorimetric, Perceptual or Saturation

error.message: A rendering intent with non-standard value is used

rule.description: Font programs' "cmap" tables for all symbolic TrueType fonts shall contain exactly one encoding

error.message: The embedded font program for a symbolic TrueType font contains more than one cmap subtable

rule.description: A stream object dictionary shall not contain the F, FFilter, or FDecodeParms keys
rule.test: F == null && FFilter == null && FDecodeParms == null

error.message: A stream object dictionary contains one of the F, FFilter, or FDecodeParms keys

rule.description: The LZWDecode filter shall not be permitted

error.message: LZW compression is used in the inline image

rule.description: A Widget annotation dictionary or Field dictionary shall not contain the A or AA keys

error.message: A Form field dictionary contains the AA entry

rule.description: All fonts used in a conforming file shall conform to the font specifications defined in PDF Reference 5.5. Widths - array - (Required except for the standard 14 fonts; indirect reference preferred) An array of (LastChar − FirstChar + 1) widths
rule.test: isStandard == true || (Widths_size != null && Widths_size == LastChar - FirstChar + 1)

error.message: Widths array is missing or has invalid size

rule.description: In a linearized PDF, if the ID keyword is present in both the first page trailer dictionary and the last trailer dictionary, the value to both instances of the ID keyword shall be identical

error.message: Last ID is present in the Linearized PDF and does not match the first page ID

rule.description: An ExtGState dictionary shall not contain the TR2 key with a value other than Default

error.message: An ExtGState dictionary contains the TR2 key with a value other than Default

rule.description: All fonts used in a conforming file shall conform to the font specifications defined in PDF Reference 5.5. FirstChar - integer - (Required except for the standard 14 fonts) The first character code defined in the font's Widths array

error.message: A non-standard simple font dictionary has missing or invalid LastChar entry

rule.description: An annotation dictionary shall not contain the C array or the IC array unless the colour space of the DestOutputProfile in the PDF/A-1 OutputIntent dictionary, defined in 6.2.2, is RGB

error.message: Annotation's color or interior color is used without specifying RGB-based destination output profile

rule.description: All CMaps used within a conforming file, except Identity-H and Identity-V, shall be embedded in that file as described in PDF Reference 5.6.4

error.message: A CMap is different from "Identity-H" or "Identity-V" and is not embedded

rule.description: Annotation types not defined in PDF Reference shall not be permitted. Additionally, the FileAttachment, Sound and Movie types shall not be permitted
rule.test: Subtype == "Text" || Subtype == "Link" || Subtype == "FreeText" || Subtype == "Line" || Subtype == "Square" || Subtype == "Circle" || Subtype == "Highlight" || Subtype == "Underline" || Subtype == "Squiggly" || Subtype == "StrikeOut" || Subtype == "Stamp" || Subtype == "Ink" || Subtype == "Popup" || Subtype == "Widget" || Subtype == "PrinterMark" || Subtype == "TrapNet"

error.message: Unknown or not permitted annotation type

rule.description: The Launch, Sound, Movie, ResetForm, ImportData and JavaScript actions shall not be permitted. Additionally, the deprecated set-state and no-op actions shall not be permitted. The Hide action shall not be permitted (Corrigendum 2)
rule.test: S == "GoTo" || S == "GoToR" || S == "Thread" || S == "URI" || S == "Named" || S == "SubmitForm"

error.message: Unknown or not permitted action type

rule.description: For all Type 2 CIDFonts, the CIDFont dictionary shall contain a CIDToGIDMap entry that shall be a stream mapping from CIDs to glyph indices or the name Identity, as described in PDF Reference Table 5.13

error.message: A Type 2 CIDFont dictionary has missing or invalid CIDToGIDMap entry

rule.description: Largest Integer value is 2,147,483,647. Smallest integer value is -2,147,483,648

error.message: Integer value out of range

rule.description: An XObject dictionary (Image or Form) shall not contain the OPI key

error.message: OPI key is present in the XObject dictionary(

rule.description: Maximum value of a CID (character identifier) is 65,535

error.message: Maximum value of a CID (65,535) is exceeded

rule.description: All ICCBased colour spaces shall be embedded as ICC profile streams as described in PDF Reference 4.5. The number of color components in the color space described by the ICC profile data must match the number of components actually in the ICC profile. As of PDF 1.4, N must be 1, 3, or 4

error.message: The N entry in the ICC profile dictionary is missing or does not match the number of components in the embedded ICC profile

rule.description: All ICCBased colour spaces shall be embedded as ICC profile streams as described in PDF Reference 4.5
rule.test: (deviceClass == "prtr" || deviceClass == "mntr" || deviceClass == "scnr" || deviceClass == "spac") && (colorSpace == "RGB " || colorSpace == "CMYK" || colorSpace == "GRAY" || colorSpace == "LAB ") && version < 3.0

error.message: The embedded ICC profile is either invalid or does not satisfy PDF 1.4 requirements

rule.description: The file header line shall be immediately followed by a comment consisting of a % character followed by at least four characters, each of whose encoded byte values shall have a decimal value greater than 127

error.message: Binary comment in the file header is missing or does not comply PDF/A requirements

rule.description: The metadata stream shall conform to XMP Specification.

error.message: The metadata stream doesn't conform to XMP Specification.

rule.description: All predefined schemas shall conform to XMP specification.

error.message: The predefined schema with namespace URI %1 has unknown properties: %2.

rule.description: An Image dictionary shall not contain the Alternates key

error.message: Alternates key is present in the Image dictionary(

rule.description: All non-symbolic TrueType fonts shall specify MacRomanEncoding or WinAnsiEncoding, either as the value of the Encoding entry in the font dictionary or as the value of the BaseEncoding entry in the dictionary that is the value of the Encoding entry in the font dictionary. If the value of the Encoding entry is a dictionary, it shall not contain a Differences entry.

error.message: A non-symbolic TrueType font has an encoding different from MacRomanEncoding or WinAnsiEncoding

rule.description: If an SMask key appears in an ExtGState dictionary, its value shall be None

error.message: An ExtGState contains SMask key with a value other than None

rule.description: Maximum number of indirect objects in a PDF file is 8,388,607

error.message: Maximum number of indirect objects (8,388,607) in a PDF file exceeded

rule.description: All fonts used in a conforming file shall conform to the font specifications defined in PDF Reference 5.5. BaseFont - name - (Required) The PostScript name of the font

error.message: A BaseFont entry is missing or has invalid type

rule.description: Embedded font programs shall define all font glyphs referenced for rendering with a conforming file

error.message: Not all glyphs referenced for rendering are present in the embedded font program

rule.description: A PDF/A-1 OutputIntent is an OutputIntent dictionary, as defined by PDF Reference 9.10.4, that is included in the file's OutputIntents array and has GTS_PDFA1 as the value of its S key and a valid ICC profile stream as the value its DestOutputProfile key

error.message: The embedded PDF/A Output Intent colour profile is either invalid or does not provide BToA information

rule.description: All fonts used in a conforming file shall conform to the font specifications defined in PDF Reference 5.5. FirstChar - integer - (Required except for the standard 14 fonts) The first character code defined in the font's Widths array

error.message: A non-standard simple font dictionary has missing or invalid FirstChar entry

rule.description: The object number and generation number shall be separated by a single white-space character. The generation number and obj keyword shall be separated by a single white-space character. The object number and endobj keyword shall each be preceded by an EOL marker. The obj and endobj keywords shall each be followed by an EOL marker.

error.message: Spacings of object number and generation number or keywords 'obj' and 'endobj' do not comply PDF/A specification

rule.description: If a file's OutputIntents array contains more than one entry, then all entries that contain a DestOutputProfile key shall have as the value of that key the same indirect object, which shall be a valid ICC profile stream
rule.test: destOutputProfileIndirect == null || gOutputProfileIndirect == null || destOutputProfileIndirect == gOutputProfileIndirect

error.message: File's OutputIntents array contains output intent dictionaries with non-matching destination output profiles

rule.description: A PDF/A Schema Description Schema namespace prefix is required to be "pdfaSchema".

error.message: A PDF/A Schema Description Schema namespace prefix is not "pdfaSchema".

rule.description: Maximum depth of graphics state nesting by q and Q operators is 28

error.message: Maximum depth of graphics state nesting (q and Q operators) is exceeded

rule.description: The document catalog dictionary shall not include an AA entry for an additional-actions dictionary

error.message: The document catalog dictionary contains an additional-actions dictionary (AA entry)

rule.description: The font programs for all fonts used within a conforming file shall be embedded within that file, as defined in PDF Reference 5.8, except when the fonts are used exclusively with text rendering mode 3

error.message: The font program is not embedded

rule.description: All fonts used in a conforming file shall conform to the font specifications defined in PDF Reference 5.5. Subtype - name - (Required) The type of font; must be "Type1" for Type 1 fonts, "MMType1" for multiple master fonts, "TrueType" for TrueType fonts "Type3" for Type 3 fonts, "Type0" for Type 0 fonts and "CIDFontType0" or "CIDFontType2" for CID fonts
rule.test: Subtype == "Type1" || Subtype == "MMType1" || Subtype == "TrueType" || Subtype == "Type3" || Subtype == "Type0" || Subtype == "CIDFontType0" || Subtype == "CIDFontType2"

error.message: A Font dictionary has missing or invalid Subtype entry

rule.description: An annotation dictionary shall contain the F key. The F key’s Print flag bit shall be set to 1 and its Hidden, Invisible and NoView flag bits shall be set to 0

error.message: Annotation flags are either missing or have forbidden values

rule.description: For every font embedded in a conforming file, the glyph width information stored in the Widths entry of the font dictionary and in the embedded font program shall be consistent

error.message: Glyph width information in the embedded font program is not consistent with the Widths entry of the font dictionary

rule.description: DeviceRGB may be used only if the file has a PDF/A-1 OutputIntent that uses an RGB colour space

error.message: DeviceRGB colour space is used without RGB output intent profile

rule.description: The following keys, if present in an ExtGState object, shall have the values shown: CA - 1.0

error.message: An ExtGState dictionary contains the CA key (stroke alpha) with a value other than 1.0

rule.description: The xref keyword and the cross reference subsection header shall be separated by a single EOL marker

error.message: Spacings after the 'xref' keyword iin the cross reference table do not comply PDF/A specification

rule.description: DeviceCMYK may be used only if the file has a PDF/A-1 OutputIntent that uses a CMYK colour space

error.message: DeviceCMYK colour space is used without CMYK output intent profile

rule.description: All fonts used in a conforming file shall conform to the font specifications defined in PDF Reference 5.5. Type - name - (Required) The type of PDF object that this dictionary describes; must be Font for a font dictionary

error.message: A Font dictionary has missing or invalid Type entry

rule.description: Absolute real value must be less than or equal to 32767.0

error.message: Real value out of range

rule.description: The following keys, if present in an ExtGState object, shall have the values shown: CA - 1.0

error.message: An ExtGState dictionary contains the ca key (fill alpha) with a value other than 1.0

rule.description: The property "corr" is not specified in PDF/A Identification Schema in PDF/A-1 specification.

error.message: The "corr" property of the PDF/A Identification Schema should not be used in PDF/A-1 conforming file.

rule.description: All extension schemas used in a conforming file shall have their descriptions embedded within that file in the metadata stream.

error.message: Missed definition of an extention schema with namespace URI: %1
